properties.areaDesc: Washington, GA; Wilkinson, GA; Johnson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 9:24PM EST until January 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Washington and Wilkinson
Counties

Little River near Washington affecting Taliaferro and Wilkes
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Oconee.
* From early tomorrow until Saturday morning.
* At 9 PM Tuesday the stage was 15.5 feet and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast to develop.
* Flood stage is 17 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by early Wednesday,
and continue rising, reaching near 20 feet by early Thursday
morning. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage by early
Saturday morning.
* At 15 feet, bankfull conditions occur along the river. The Old Balls
Ferry Road boat ramp, just upstream and right bank from the Georgia
Highway 57 bridge, will be flooded.

At 17 feet, flood stage is reached. The water level reaches the top
of the Old Balls Ferry Road boat ramp, just upstream and rightbank
from the Georgia Highway 57 bridge. Minor flooding of the woodlands
near the river occurs.

Between 19 and 21 feet, the water level begins to flood the dirt
parking lot area near the Old Balls Ferry Road boat ramp, just
upstream and rightbank from the Georgia Highway 57 bridge. Minor
flooding spreads further into the woodlands near the river.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Saturday morning
